channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A long-running anti-DEI lawsuit could help companies defend themselves from reverse-racism claims

item.title: Gen Zers are flocking to these Midwest housing markets where homes are about 30% cheaper than the coasts
item.description: Seven of the 10 most affordable metros for young homeowners are in the Midwest.
